communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: March on the DNC 2024 Communications (CPD)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

All texts and emails sent or received by Superintendent of Police Larry Snelling from December 1, 2023 to September 1, 2024 that contain any of the following keywords or phrases: "March on the DNC", "sight and sound", and "sight & sound". 

For any potentially responsive documents, please send full the conversation history and any attachments.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. I am a freelance reporter for Medill News, and I am requesting this information in that editorial capacity.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Maggie Dougherty
